rows.label: qst701002_msg0001
rows.name:
We're going to need the help of an
excellent builder if we want to get
this shelter off the ground, so to speak.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0002
rows.name:
Zain is the best builder around.
You'll find him in Fabri Industry Ward,
but he's known to be a little...difficult.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0003
rows.name:
Morumo claims to be his friend,
so maybe that's enough to at least
get him to talk to you.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0101
rows.name:
Yeahhh, I have to say I saw this coming.
This isn't going to be easy.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0102
rows.name:
Zain-san's as old-school as they come.
Stubborn old goat, that one. Rita
usually acts as an intermediary, but...

rows.label: qst701002_msg0103
rows.name:
Wait, I seem to remember him
mentioning that Rita was the reason
he couldn't leave the capital.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0104
rows.name:
Could it be he's just worried about
her? It can't be easy when your only
daughter is off adventuring.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0105
rows.name:
I hate to trouble you, but if you run into
Rita somewhere on your travels, could
you ask her to pay a visit home?

rows.label: qst701002_msg0106
rows.name:
She's probably in Gula. How do I
know? Because that's where I told her
to go. "Go to Gula! See the world!"

rows.label: qst701002_msg0201
rows.name:
Where do I reckon Rita is? Well, she's
not exactly a seasoned pro. She's
probably just...wandering around.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0202
rows.name:
Why don't you try asking around
the harbor over in Gula?

rows.label: qst701002_msg0203
rows.name:
She's pretty memorable. I'm sure
someone'll remember seeing her.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0301
rows.name:
Gathering materials for the shelter?
Maybe you can find some use for this.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0302
rows.name:
You'll have to forgive me. That's pretty
much all I can offer. My finances are
in a bit of a rough spot right now.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0303
rows.name: I hope that comes in handy, at any rate.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0401
rows.name:
There's no doubting Zain's skill.
Completing this shelter is going to
be a big weight off everyone's minds.

rows.label: qst701002_msg0402
rows.name:
You're doing us a great service helping
us out here. We could really use your
help a while longer.
